## Preview
<ImageCarousel />

_If the built-in CarouselPrevious and CarouselNext components still don't work, uncomment the custom button section in the code. The main issues were likely. CarouselPrevious and CarouselNext components still don't work, uncomment the custom button section in the code. The main issues were likely._

## Features
- Hero Section
- About Section
- Work Section
- Education Section
- Projects Section
- Contact Section
- Blog

npm install shadcn@latest add https://shadwui.com/r/hero-01.json
